abstract: Detective with New York Police Dept's Emergency Service Unit shoots and wounds Kyron Cradle in his East New York, Brooklyn,  apartment while officers attempt to execute search warrant for gun
lead_paragraph: The man, Kyron Cradle, was hit in the leg by a detective with the Emergency Service Unit of the Police Department as the police were executing a search warrant for a gun.

headline.main: Detective Shoots Unarmed Man During Raid in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Man Is Shot by Detective During Raid in Brooklyn

snippet: The man, Kyron Cradle, was hit in the leg by a detective with the Emergency Service Unit of the Police Department as the police were executing a search warrant for a gun.
